term.title: anilides

item.text: Compounds derived from oxoacidsRkE(=O)l(OH)m (l â‰ 0) by replacing an OH group by the NHPh group or derivative formed by ring substitution; N-phenyl amides, e.g. CH3C(=O)NHPh acetanilide.
